page.title: 03 FARMING IN OUR AREA
page.content: Many farms in our area are company owned and form the group E.K.P.(East Kent Packers).These include Ewell,Lady Dane,Kemsdale and Homstall lane farms, the first three of which are owned and run by Sandbanks farm Graveney.They cover about 1500 acres.They produce apples,pears,strawberries,raspberries, blackcurrants,cherries,wheat and barley.They supply large markets and supermarkets in LONDON and elsewhere in Kent. School and Poplar hall farms are owned & run by the Austen brothers.They farm 150 acres producing wheat,barley, potatoes and fruit,which they sell to wholesalers and corn merchants. Queens court farm is part of the Shepherd Neame group & produces wheat, barley,potatoes.They also keep a herd of cows,selling to small grocers, butchers and the milkmarking board.
